messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Dear Voter, Politicians are not listening and out of touch with the people! Let UKIP put this country back on its feet. Let's stop this talk of closures, reopen the A&Es and tell the developers that the NHS is NOT FOR SALE! Hammersmith has not built any Council Houses recently! Your council has sold Earls Court Exhibition Centre, and want to sell off our Council Houses too. Let's stop them! Your votes are solid, give us the tools and we will put the GREAT back in Great Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.
UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
UKIP will pour 63 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our 55 million a day EU membership fee.
By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the 630 million a day spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the ONLY PARTY with money to spend at home.

issues.brexitEurope: By stopping our EU membership fee and clawing back the money spent on foreign aid, UKIP is the only party with money to spend at home.
issues.economy: UKIP will SCRAP income tax on the minimum wage, SCRAP the bedroom tax, and SCRAP the tax on your children when you die.
issues.health: UKIP will pour 63 billion a year EXTRA into the NHS to keep it as a free public service, funded by scrapping our 55 million a day EU membership fee. Reopen the A&Es.
issues.immigration: UKIP wants a FAIRER Australian-style points-based system to decide who comes to work and settle here.

housing.content: Hammersmith has not built any Council Houses recently! Your council has sold Earls Court Exhibition Centre, and want to sell off our Council Houses too.
